headline: Corning Rises 43.6% Year to Date: Reason to Buy the Stock?
summary: GLW's 43.6% YTD surge is fueled by solid traction in the optical communication and Specialty Materials segments, and major tech partnerships driving growth momentum.

headline: Corning Stock Was a Dot-Com Darling. AI Could Help It Rebound, Say Analysts.
summary: Corning makes glass products for iPhone screens as well as optic fiber and cable for communications.

headline: Corning Set to Benefit From AI-Driven Fiber Demand, UBS Says
summary: Corning (GLW) remains positioned for growth as demand for fiber optics continues to exceed market ex

headline: Top ROE Stocks to Buy as AI Rally Propels Markets to Record Highs
summary: Arista, TE Connectivity, Corning, Banco Bilbao, and AppLovin stand out with strong ROE as markets hit record highs on AI momentum.

headline: UBS upgrades this materials stock to Buy on strong AI-driven fiber growth
summary: Investing.com -- UBS upgraded shares of specialty glass maker Corning (NYSE:GLW) to Buy from Neutral, citing accelerating AI-driven fiber demand that is expected to power growth across its Optical Communications business.

headline: These Stocks Are Moving the Most Today: Nvidia, NIO, Biogen, Newmont, Corning, and More
summary: Nvidia declines, NIO rises after the release of second-quarter earnings, and Biogen trades higher after the Food and Drug Administration approves a once-weekly injectable version of Alzheimer’s treatment Leqembi.
